name: AfroPenguin
description:
Argentina is in chaos and the government wants to go after the local wildlife in order to tax them... for something... (insert local stupid reason here, as it is tradition in Argentina).

AfroPenguin wants to escape from his ill-fated destiny and live "la vida loca".

Help AfroPenguin in this single level adventure game, collecting strong currency to make his dream come true!

There are three available endings depending on your actions.
